title.rendered: Frontend Engineering Internship at Schbang, Mumbai [3 Months; Stipend Available]: Apply Now!

content.rendered:
Schbang is inviting online applications from eligible and interested candidates for the Frontend Engineering Internship Program in Mumbai.

About Schbang

Schbang is a Creative, Media & Technology Transformation Company founded in 2015, with a 1,000+ member team across Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, and London. It offers end-to-end solutions, including digital content, social media, SEO, video production, influencer management, and media planning. As a Google Premier Partner, Adobe Solution Partner, and HubSpot Certified Partner, Schbang has worked with 300+ brands, including Marvel, Jio, Myntra, Amazon, Porsche, and NIVEA. Committed to global expansion, it continues to drive award-winning innovation in digital transformation.

Responsibilities

  • Assist in the development and maintenance of web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Collaborate with the development team to implement user interface designs and features.
  • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to improving code quality.
  • Learn and apply best practices in frontend development.
  • Assist in debugging and troubleshooting frontend issues.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest frontend technologies and trends.
  • Potentially work with frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js (depending on your company’s stack).
  • Contribute to the creation of responsive and accessible web designs.
  • Assist in the creation of unit and integration tests.

Requirements

  • Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Familiarity with web development concepts and principles.
  • A strong desire to learn and grow as a frontend developer.
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
  • Ability to work effectively in a team environment.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • (Optional, but beneficial) Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).
  • (Optional, but beneficial) Experience with frontend frameworks (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js).
  • (Optional, but beneficial) Knowledge of responsive design principles.

How to Apply?

Interested and eligible candidates can apply via this link.

Location

Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
